lead_paragraph: Antoine Griezmann stands on the Maracana pitch in Rio de Janeiro and pulls the bottom of his dark blue France shirt up over his eyes to hide the tears.

headline.print_headline: France Hope Script of Dramas With Germany Can Be Changed
